| History                 = The Jade Dragon Triad was a criminal organization in [[Madripoor]] ran by [[Turtle Head Wu (Earth-616)|Turtle Head Wu]]. The organization's activities included pandering, human trafficking, and the production of illegal knockoffs.<!-- {{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 1}} -->

The androids [[Albert (Earth-616)|Albert]] and [[Elsie-Dee (Earth-616)|Elsie-Dee]] broke into the organization's factory where they made knockoffs using slave labor to retrieve Elsie-Dee's arms, which were being used by a production robot. When the pair were confronted by Wu and his gang, Albert took out Wu's men while Elsie-Dee bit down on Wu's left ear for his criminal offenses. Wu later gathered his men to get revenge on Albert and Elsie-Dee.{{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 1}}

The confrontation with the android didn't end well for the gang. Many were hurt or killed when a  gang member wielding a flamethrower was killed and his flamethrower's flaming contents were expelled. Others were hurt by Elsie-Dee when she chose to fight the gang alone, leaving many with broke kneecaps.{{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 2}}
| Equipment               =

| Weapons                 = Machetes, bats, knives, automatic firearms, chainsaw, formerly a flamethrower
